verses.verse: O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> thy <S%H8088>speech,<s%> and was <S%H3372>afraid:<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2421>revive<s%> thy <S%H6467>work<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H8141>years,<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> make <S%H3045>known;<s%> in <S%H7267>wrath<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H7355>mercy.<s%>

God <S%H433><s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H4480>Teman,<s%> <S%H8487><s%> and the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> from <S%H4480>mount<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H6290>Paran.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%> His <S%H1935>glory<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of his <S%H8416>praise.<s%>

And his <S%H5051>brightness<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> as the <S%H216>light;<s%> he had <S%H7161>horns<s%> coming out of his <S%H4480>hand:<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> was the <S%H2253>hiding<s%> of his <S%H5797>power.<s%>
Before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H1980>went<s%> the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and burning <S%H7565>coals<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> at his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

He <S%H5975>stood,<s%> and <S%H4128>measured<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> he <S%H7200>beheld,<s%> and drove <S%H5425>asunder<s%> the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and the <S%H5703>everlasting<s%> <S%H2042>mountains<s%> were <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> the <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H1389>hills<s%> did <S%H7817>bow:<s%> his <S%H1979>ways<s%> are <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H3572>Cushan<s%> <S%H8478>in<s%> <S%H205>affliction:<s%> and the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> did <S%H7264>tremble.<s%>

Was the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2734>displeased<s%> against the <S%H5104>rivers?<s%> was thine <S%H639>anger<s%> against the <S%H5104>rivers?<s%> was thy <S%H5678>wrath<s%> against the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou didst <S%H7392>ride<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H5483>horses<s%> and thy <S%H4818>chariots<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation?<s%>

Thy <S%H7198>bow<s%> was made quite <S%H5783>naked,<s%> <S%H6181><s%> according to the <S%H7621>oaths<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> even thy <S%H562>word.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%> Thou didst <S%H1234>cleave<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> thee, and they <S%H2342>trembled:<s%> the <S%H2230>overflowing<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> passed <S%H5674>by:<s%> the <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H5414>uttered<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> on <S%H7315>high.<s%>

The <S%H8121>sun<s%> and <S%H3394>moon<s%> stood <S%H5975>still<s%> in their <S%H2073>habitation:<s%> at the <S%H216>light<s%> of thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> they <S%H1980>went,<s%> and at the <S%H5051>shining<s%> of thy <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H2595>spear.<s%>
Thou didst march <S%H6805>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> thou didst <S%H1758>thresh<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> in <S%H639>anger.<s%>

Thou wentest <S%H3318>forth<s%> for the <S%H3468>salvation<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> even for <S%H3468>salvation<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thine <S%H4899>anointed;<s%> thou <S%H4272>woundedst<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> out of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> by <S%H6168>discovering<s%> the <S%H3247>foundation<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H6677>neck.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

Thou didst strike <S%H5344>through<s%> with his <S%H4294>staves<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H6518>villages:<s%> they came out as a <S%H5590>whirlwind<s%> to <S%H6327>scatter<s%> me: their <S%H5951>rejoicing<s%> was <S%H3644>as<s%> to <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H4565>secretly.<s%>
Thou didst <S%H1869>walk<s%> through the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with thine <S%H5483>horses,<s%> through the <S%H2563>heap<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

When I <S%H8085>heard,<s%> my <S%H990>belly<s%> <S%H7264>trembled;<s%> my <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H6750>quivered<s%> at the <S%H6963>voice:<s%> <S%H7538>rottenness<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and I <S%H7264>trembled<s%> <S%H8478>in<s%> myself, <S%H834>that<s%> I might <S%H5117>rest<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble:<s%> when he cometh <S%H5927>up<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he will <S%H1464>invade<s%> them with his troops.

Although <S%H3588><s%> the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6524>blossom,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> shall <S%H2981>fruit<s%> be in the <S%H1612>vines;<s%> the <S%H4639>labor<s%> of the <S%H2132>olive<s%> shall <S%H3584>fail,<s%> and the <S%H7709>fields<s%> shall <S%H6213>yield<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H400>meat;<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> shall be cut <S%H1504>off<s%> from the <S%H4480>fold,<s%> <S%H4356><s%> and there shall be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1241>herd<s%> in the stalls: <S%H7517><s%>
Yet <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H5937>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I will <S%H1523>joy<s%> in the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H136>God<s%> is my <S%H2428>strength,<s%> and he will <S%H7760>make<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> like <S%H355>hinds'<s%> feet, and he will make me to <S%H1869>walk<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> mine high <S%H1116>places.<s%> To the chief <S%H5329>singer<s%> on my stringed <S%H5058>instruments.<s%>
